text: Joey Don Essex (born 29 July 1990) is an English television personality and DJ for Sugar Hut, a nightclub in Brentwood, Essex. He rose to fame in 2011 after appearing in the ITV2 television series The Only Way Is Essex. Essex and his sister Frankie left the show in 2013, although his cousin Chloe remains on it. In 2013, Essex took part in the first series of the celebrity diving show Splash! and the thirteenth series of I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here!, where he finished in fourth place. In 2015, he won the Channel 4 reality series The Jump. Essex is at least an ex-social smoker. This picture was taken, and published on the Metro Website on 3rd November 2011. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:English autobiographers Category:I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! contestants Category:People from the London Borough of Southwark Category:Reality show winners Category:Television personalities from London Category:The Only Way Is Essex
title: Joey Essex
